name: World War 3 (itch)
description:
The world and especially Europe is going through some dark times with Russia invading Ukraine and we might be close to a potential World War 3 therefore you can play this game and prepare yourself for  a potential World War. You can fight as either USA or Russia and your objective is to prevent the other country from sending nuclear bombs by eliminating the president (Biden or Putin). There are multiple guns, such as M4s, Machine Guns, Glocks, SMGs, Rocket Launchers etc. There are also enemy AIs that will patrol and shoot when you get too close. Lastly there are spetsnazs soldiers protecting Putin and Navy Seals protecting Biden.

Developed in Unity using C#
